title: Fate - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Secret Crush   Short Story
author: Ming Yue Ting Feng   明月听风
description:
A love triggered by a secret crush.
The red threads of fate are tightly intertwined with each other, no matter how time and place change, destiny always manages to bring them together.>
